artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Iseya Kanekichi; Carved by Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: portrait of man with blueish skin, seen from PL with head turned toward picture plane; wrists crossed; man wears grey kimono and is bent forward; rainy landscape at top with white blossoming trees; pink square cartouche and red rectangular cartouche, both with text, in URC
marks: in red rectangle: {Seigen} (character\'s name) | Na in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Narihira's Poem and the Ghost of Monk Seigen
